key_takeaways: Solution: Create simple mobile app interface for complex AI functionality (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: Design product for natural sharing behavior (Channel: viral)
Growth Tactic: Create Instagram reels that remix existing viral content with unique spin (Channel: content)
AI Workflow: AI-powered face animation app creation
Strategy: Focus spending on inference rather than marketing for viral apps
